settings.language.label: üñ•Ô∏è UI Language Override
settings.language.help: Choose the tracker interface language or follow SillyTavern's global setting.
settings.title: Tracker Enhanced
settings.enable.label: Enable Tracker Enhanced
settings.connection_profile.label: üîí Independent Connection Profile
settings.connection_profile.help:
Independent Connection: Tracker Enhanced uses a separate, dedicated connection that does NOT interfere with SillyTavern's main connection.
Recommended: Create a dedicated connection profile specifically for tracker generation to ensure optimal performance and avoid conflicts.
Note: Even "Same as current" uses an independent connection with the current profile's settings.
settings.completion_preset.label: üéØ Dedicated Completion Preset
settings.completion_preset.help:
Recommended: Create a dedicated completion preset optimized for tracker generation.
Compatibility Indicators:
‚Ä¢ ‚úÖ Compatible - Matches your selected profile's API
‚Ä¢ ‚ö†Ô∏è May have compatibility issues - Use with caution
‚Ä¢ ‚ùå Likely incompatible - Different API, may cause errors
Tip: Use settings like higher temperature for more creative tracking or lower for consistent results.
settings.generation_target.label: üë§ Generation Target
settings.generation_target.help: Specifies who the tracker should auto-generate for: User, Character, Both, or None.
settings.show_popup_for.label: ü™ü Show Popup For
settings.show_popup_for.help: Specifies who should receive a popup to manually enter tracker data: User, Character, Both, or None.
settings.format.label: Tracker Format
settings.format.help: Choose the format for the tracker: YAML (recommended for lower token usage) or JSON (increases token count but may work better for struggling models).
settings.presets.label: Presets
settings.presets.button.new.title: Save preset as
settings.presets.button.save.title: Update current preset
settings.presets.button.rename.title: Rename current preset
settings.presets.button.restore.title: Restore current preset
settings.presets.button.delete.title: Delete current preset
settings.presets.import.input.title: Import tracker enhanced preset file
settings.presets.import.button.title: Import tracker enhanced preset
settings.presets.export.button.title: Export current tracker enhanced preset
settings.context.label: Context Template
settings.context.help:
Define the template for generating the tracker. Use macros like:
{{participantGuidance}}, {{trackerSystemPrompt}}, {{characterDescriptions}}, {{recentMessages}}, {{currentTracker}}, {{trackerFormat}}, {{trackerFieldPrompt}}.
settings.system.label: System Prompt
settings.system.help:
Define the system-level prompt for tracker generation. Use macros like:
{{charNames}}, {{defaultTracker}}, {{trackerFormat}}.
settings.request.label: Request Prompt
settings.request.help:
Set the request prompt for generating the tracker. Available macros include:
{{trackerFieldPrompt}}, {{trackerFormat}}, {{message}} (last message).
settings.roleplay.label: Roleplay Injection Prompt
settings.roleplay.help: Additional guidance inserted ahead of the tracker block when we inject into SillyTavern prompts. Keep it concise and focused on diegetic knowledge boundaries.
settings.recent_messages.label: Recent Messages Template
settings.recent_messages.help:
Template for recent messages in the tracker. Macros include:
{{char}}, {{message}}, {{tracker}}, {{#if tracker}}...{{/if}}.
settings.character_description.label: Character Description Template
settings.character_description.help:
Define the format for character descriptions in the tracker. Macros:
{{char}}, {{charDescription}}.
settings.message_tracker_html.label: Message Tracker HTML
settings.message_tracker_html.help:
Define the HTML for the tracker preview displayed with each message. Use macros like:
{{key.subkey}}, {{#join "delimiter" arrayKey}}, {{#foreach objectOrArrayKey itemName}}...{{itemName.subKey}}...{{/foreach}}, {{#if key.subkey}}...{{/if}}.
settings.message_tracker_html.generate_b: Generate HTML template based on current Prompt Maker fields
settings.message_tracker_html.generate_h: Click to auto-generate template from your Prompt Maker fields
settings.message_tracker_script.label: Message Tracker JavaScript
settings.message_tracker_script.help: Define any custom javascript to be used in the tracker preview. The javascript should return an object with all the functions that can be accessed through SillyTavern.trackerEnhanced
settings.message_tracker_script.generate: Generate JavaScript for gender-specific field hiding based on current Prompt Maker fields
Click to auto-generate JavaScript with gender-specific field hiding
settings.prompt_maker.label: Prompt Maker UI
settings.prompt_maker.help: This is where the tracker fields, default values, and example values are defined.
settings.number_of_messages.label: Number of Recent Messages to Include
settings.number_of_messages.help: Set how many recent messages are included in tracker generation prompts.
settings.generate_from_message.label: Message Number to Start Generating Tracker From
settings.generate_from_message.help: Specify which message (by number) the tracker starts generating from.
settings.minimum_depth.label: Minimum Depth
settings.minimum_depth.help: Specify the minimum depth for a tracker to be injected at.
settings.response_length.label: Response Length
settings.response_length.help: Set a response token limit for tracker prompts. Leave blank or set to 0 to use the default response token limit.
settings.toolbar_indicator.label: Show toolbar injection indicator
settings.devtools.label: Enable Dev Tools
settings.debug.label: Enable Debug Logging
prompts.participant_guidance.body: Always include the following participants in CharactersPresent and Characters: {{participants}}.
prompts.participant_guidance.fields: Never remove these participants; infer their state even if they are temporarily off-screen.
trackerPromptMaker.title: Tracker Prompt Maker
trackerPromptMaker.messages.confirmRemov: Are you sure you want to remove this field?
